segments.text: Good evening , Do you have a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . The reservation under Mr . Watson .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , yes , a table for four at 8
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Em , no , thanks . I think we'll go straight to the table , By the way . may I check my overcoat here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , sir . We'll keep it in the cloakroom for you . Here is your number . When you leave , show it to the waiter behind the counter , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Could you show us to our table now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please follow me , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is your table . It's Number 10 .
segments.speaker: S1
